description:
The web, as well as Enterprise IT, suffers from an explosion in the volume of data. With this growing volume of data, expertise in a reporting tool is in demand. As a result, both, experienced professionals as well as newbies get a lot of new opportunities.

I have often landed on some very lucrative and long term contracts due to a certification in a lesser known tool. SAP WebI is one such tool, that is fast gaining popularity as the preferred reporting tool in a lot of organizations.

In addition, a job in report development, gives you access to data and business experts. This results in opportunity to enhance knowledge in niche business areas and the expertise in business processes.

This course will help you get started with SAP Web Intelligence. We work closely with users to answer their questions. After completing the course, you will receive additional material including:

- Quizzes to test your knowledge.

- Report development and analysis exercises for hands on practice.

- Group Q'nA sessions.

- Help you to get access to a live Web Intelligence environment.

In the real world report development follows four primary stages/steps. The course is structured along those four steps:

1. Data Access

2. Data Analysis

3. Report Formatting

4. Publishing

Good Luck and touch base with our instructors for support and a more interactive training experience.
title: Learn SAP WebI reporting tool: A Simple Fast-Paced Training
